problem_text: A projectile must pass through a point at \((x_p, y_p)\). Determine the required launch angle(s) for a given launch speed \(v_0\).
diagram_request: Origin launch to a target point (x_p,y_p); show possible low-angle and high-angle solutions.
solution_steps: Eliminate time using t = x_p/(v_0 cosθ).
Obtain equation in tanθ and solve quadratic.
common_mistakes: Dropping terms leading to linear instead of quadratic equation
